Uses of Package
pl.korotkevics.ships.client.gui.events

  • Packages that use pl.korotkevics.ships.client.gui.events 
    Package Description
    pl.korotkevics.ships.client.gui.events  
  • Classes in pl.korotkevics.ships.client.gui.events used by pl.korotkevics.ships.client.gui.events 
    Class and Description
    HitShotEvent
    Event firing when player performs a shot.
    LossEvent
    Event firing when player loses the game.
    MissShotEvent
    Event firing when player misses a shot.
    OpponentConnectedEvent
    Event firing when opponent establishes a connection.
    OpponentShotEvent
    Event firing when opponent performs a shot.
    OpponentWithdrawEvent
    Event firing when opponent withdraws.
    RandomPlacementEvent
    Event firing when a fleet is placed randomly.
    ShipDestroyedEvent
    Event firing when player destroys a ship.
    TurnChangeEvent
    Event firing when a turn has to be changed (toggled).
    WinEvent
    Event firing when user win the game.
